weapon.name: Big 100K
weapon.description: An ultimate weapon because of superb damage, bonus to hit, and a special ability: it's darkness blade, but if it senses you are fighting an undead or zombie, it becomes a light weapon!

SPECIAL.Notes: Occurs only when not triggered. Half the damage done on the second hit is added to the player's HP.
Occurs only when triggered. Half the damage done on the second hit is added to the player's MP.

OTHER.Notes: On trigger, if you attack before the sword finishes its transform animation you'll still deal Darkness damage. It's possible, against enemies with negative elemental resistances, to lose HP/MP when the special is triggered.
